sources.title: Post Office Investigator
sources.description: Title: Post Office Investigator Summary: A young postman becomes involved in the theft of rare stamps featuring inverted images of the Statue of Liberty. Along the way he encounters attractive criminal Clara Kelso, double-crossing gang members, and Post Office Inspectors. Directed by: George Blair Actors: Audrey Long, Warren Douglas, Jeff Donnell Production Company: Republic Pictures (I) Release Date: 1 September 1949 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 A young postman becomes involved in the theft of rare stamps featuring inverted images of the Statue of Liberty. Along the way he encounters attractive criminal Clara Kelso, double-crossing gang members, and Post Office Inspectors.

metadata.Plot: A young postman becomes involved in the theft of rare stamps featuring inverted images of the Statue of Liberty. Along the way he encounters attractive criminal Clara Kelso, double-crossing gang members, and Post Office Inspectors.
